BEVEL

Bevel Limited Edition Gift Set

Sale price$20.00 Regular price$39.95(/)

*20% OFF APPLIED AT CHECKOUT

Bevel Limited Edition Gift Set. Freshness, care, and confidence—all wrapped up for the holidays. This limited-edition set brings together Bevel’s essentials for clean, hydrated hair and skin, plus everything you need to stay fresh from head to toe.

What’s Inside:

  • 2-in-1 Strengthening Shampoo & Conditioner: Cleanses and strengthens textured hair while locking in moisture.

  • Bevel Deodorant: Aluminum-free, clear protection that glides on smooth and keeps you fresh all day.

  • Bevel Moisturizing Body Wash – Supreme Oak: Deep-cleansing, hydrating formula with a warm, rich scent of almonds, bourbon, and birch.

  • Body Sponge: Gently exfoliates to remove buildup for a refreshed, clean feel.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Head-to-Toe Care: A complete grooming routine that nourishes hair, skin, and body.

  • Hydrates + Strengthens: Designed to maintain moisture and support healthy-looking hair and skin.

  • Signature Scent: Supreme Oak delivers a smooth, sophisticated finish with every shower.

  • Gift-Ready: The perfect set to give—or keep—for the season of self-care.

Limited edition. Packaging may vary.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE
